results.title: Immortal beloved [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Bernard Rose, Bruce Davey and ICON
results.brief_description: When a cryptic letter from musical genius, Beethoven, turned up shortly after his death, it started one of history’s most compelling romantic mysteries. An enduring riddle that remains unsolved to this day. Who, among the scores of women that Beethoven seduced, was his “Immortal Beloved”? Gary Oldman and Isabella Rossellini share a love as hypnotic as the music Beethoven created, in this enthralling film based on the celebrated life of one of the greatest composers that ever lived.

results.title: Wild target
results.creator_credit: Pierre Salvadori, Philippe Martin and Sharmill Films
results.brief_description: This is a winning black farce and a wistful romantic comedy. Starring seasoned veteran Jean Rochefort as a grave-faced professional hitman who guided by his mother in the family business has reached the pinnacle of his career. He is a control freak and self-improver, meticulous at work and at home and a confirmed bachelor and erstwhile linguist. Hard at work one day he runs into a young man (played by Guillaume Diepardieu) who becomes his reluctant apprentice with hilarious results. In French with English subtitles.

results.title: Free Willy 3: the rescue
results.creator_credit: Sam Pillsbury, Jennie Lew-Tugend, Monarchy Enterprises B. V., Regency Entertainment (USA) and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: Willy’s best friend, Jesse (Jason James Richter), is working with his mentor Randolph (August Schellenberg) monitoring whales off the Pacific Northwest coast. He befriends a young boy, Max, who shares Jesse’s love for whales. Max’s fisherman father however possesses a mysterious secret linked to the depleting orca population and it is up to Jesse and Max to embark on a rescue mission to save the whales. An entertaining family movie that is as much about whale conservation as it is about two boys love for whales. Also starring Annie Corley, Vincent Berry and Patrick Kilpatrick.

results.title: Titanic
results.creator_credit: James Cameron, Jon Landau and Lightstorm Entertainment
results.brief_description: This sweeping love story sailed into the hearts of moviegoers around the globe, ultimately emerging as the most popular motion picture of all time. Starring Leonardo Di Caprio and Kate Winslet as star-crossed lovers who find themselves on the maiden voyage of the “unsinkable” R.M.S. Titanic. When the doomed luxury liner strikes an iceberg in the frigid North Atlantic, their passionate love affair becomes a thrilling race for survival. Winner of eleven Academy Awards including Best Picture, this tale of forbidden love and courage in the face of disaster triumphs as a true cinematic masterpiece. Presented in Widescreen format.

results.title: Dead tired = Grosse fatigue
results.creator_credit: Michel Blanc, Canal+, Gaumont-British Instructional and TF1 Films productions
results.brief_description:
Imitation is the greatest compliment. But for Michel, having an impersonator is the biggest nightmare. Michel Blanc is an international film star who is about to have his life turned upside down. A look-alike is posing as him, making public appearances, hosting autograph signings and living his luxurious live. But his identical also happens to be sleazy, greedy and overly aggressive; and when he starts attacking women, dumping business associates and assaulting fans, the real Michel finds himself chased by the law, shunned by his friends and thrown behind bars! Now the world famous star with a reputation to uphold finds he’s about to be ruined by a man who looks identical and acts even better than he. Michel sets off to locate and eliminate his double with the help of Carole Bouquet. The film is filled with cameo by real showbiz personalities sending themselves up and the excesses of their industry. A comedy with a double twist directed by Michel Blanc, from an idea by Bertrand Blier In French with sub-titles.
Cast includes Roman Polanski

results.title: The Shooting (S)
results.creator_credit: Monte Hellman, Jack Nicholson and Santa Clara Productions
results.brief_description: A group of bounty hunters make camp in a bleak desert. Returning to camp Willett (Warren Oates) finds out his brother has gotten drunk in town and run down a little boy. Additionally his brother’s partner has gotten shot in the back by an unknown gunman. Coley (Will Hutchins), fearful of what is going on gives Willett his guns. The next day, the two meet a mysterious woman (Millie Perkins) who offers Willett $1,000 to take her to the town of Kingsley. Although this film is relatively unknown, it is attracting a small but strong cult following, and is attracting more reviews each year.

results.title: Hercules returns
results.creator_credit: David Parker, Philip Jaroslow and Philm Productions
results.brief_description: After resigning from their jobs, 2 film company executives (David Argue and Bruce Spence) open a revival theatre. On their grand opening they plan to screen the Italian epic, “Hercules”, the film that closed the theatre down. Their ex-boss exacts revenge by sending them the wrong print; an Italian one with no subtitles. With little or no means for rectifying the situation, they make do with what they have at hand and dub the voices themselves. What eventuates is a dramatic departure from the original version, which becomes set in Climidia, with Hercules a cabaret singer and a supporting cast that includes Labia, Testiculi and Machismo. Developed from the live show, “Double take meets Hercules”, written and directed by Des Mangan. Cast includes David Argue, Bruce Spence, Mary Coustas and Michael Carman.

results.title: Love and other catastrophes
results.creator_credit: Emma-Kate Croghan, Stavros Andonis Efthymiou, Newvision Films and Screwball Five
results.brief_description: A warm and witty screwball comedy about love, fate and other pressing concerns. Mia and Alice have just moved into a warehouse apartment but are still minus a housemate. Danni, Mia’s girlfriend is keen to move in, but Mia fears commitment. Mia is obsessed with her favourite lecturer and becomes embroiled in a bureaucratic nightmare as she pursues him to his new department. Alice, a frustrated perfectionist is looking for the perfect man, but cant find anyone who fits her rigorous criteria. Feeling the need for a change she falls for the most unsuitable man possible, Aria part-time gigolo. Little does she know she has her own secret admirer, Michael a shy medical student who is living in the share house from hell, and wants out! Their search for love transcends the boundaries of the Universtiy and their respective disciplines.

results.title: Friend or foe
results.creator_credit: John Krish, Gordon L.T. Scott and Children's Film Foundation
results.brief_description: A children’s feature set in Britain during World War II that focuses on the experiences of two London boys sent to board with a farming family during the period of heavy bombing. On one particular day the pilot from a ditched German bomber saves one boy from drowning and the boys must then decide whether or not to tell the English authorities of the German’s whereabouts. Useful for discussion about the sense of war, concepts of right and wrong, the nature of friendship and loyalty, peer group pressure and family relationships. Based on the novel by Michael Morpurgo.

results.title: Idiot box
results.creator_credit: David Caesar, Glenys Rowe and Central Park Films
results.brief_description: Looking for the fast track out of suburban hell, two natural born losers scheme an impossible bank heist. They feel they have strong credentials, as they spend their days watching crime dramas on television and it’s about time they put what they’ve learnt into practive. Kev, angry, unemployed, and an accident waiting to happen gets the guns. Mick, slack, cynical and also unemployed, masterminds the plan. Cast includes Ben Mendelsohn, Jeremy Sims, Robyn Loau and John Polson.
